title: Momonsters
overview: Momonsters Haha, Hehe, Hihi, Hoho and Huhu want to be the best friends of children but ... Where do you learn to be the best friend of a child? At the Momonsters Academy! Where every day a different boy or girl will show you what they like the most in the world: playing hide-and-seek, decorating some muffins, playing soccer, dancing the hulahoop, reading a comic ... Then It will be up to the Momonsters to show that they are capable of doing it themselves.
